column2: "At a time like this, should we really be talking about going on a trip?"
"Y-Yeah... There's about to be a huge life-or-death battle. Having a night out seems a little bit imprudent, yeah?"
"It's fine! We're gonna need all of our strength for this battle, so what you two need right now is some rest and relaxation."
"If all you do is train, you won't have any energy left and you'll crumble when it really counts. Rest is a part of the job too, isn't it?"
"...That's true. Gotta get your rest in so you can be fully charged for the fight. You've changed my mind."
"Alright, then let's put all our thought into picking a good destination!"
"Ah, <%me>! You coming with?"
"What's going on?"
"Sure, let's go."
"Azanami invited us to join her on a vacation so we can rest up!"
"I thought it was a bad time, but it turns out it's the perfect time. Rest is important, I can't disagree with that."
"Haha! You don't even want to know what we're talking about but you're still on board? That's the spirit, <%me>!"
"I'd sure be glad to have you come along with us, <%me>!"
"Now, it wouldn't be a vacation if we didn't go to the beach! We've gotta buy new swimsuits, too!"
"Oh, I've already got a swimsuit. Wait, didn't you already have one too, Azanami?"
"Oh please! We're finally going on a vacation! Treat yourself with a new swimsuit, it'll help you unwind!"
"You two always wear simple sports swimsuits. Why not try out, say, a cute bikini for a change?"
"What?! Whoa, hold on a sec there. That sort of thing isn't my style, or whatever..."
"Me too, I'd be a little embarrassed wearing one of those..."
"Oh come on, don't talk like that. Trying out new things is the secret to enjoying life, you know?"
"Here! <%me>, what kind of swimsuit do you think would suit these two?"
"The cute kind."
"The sexy kind."
"There you go teasing me again! There's no way a cutesy swimsuit would look good on someone like me..."
"M-Me either. I wouldn't be able to do those cute little designs justice, it'd just make me feel embarrassed."
"What?! No way! The sexy kind is impossible for me! I'd be too embarrassed..."
"Those swimsuits are only sexy if sexy people are wearing them. Don't make me say any more than that."
"B-But I mean, if you say you absolutely must see me in one, then... Well, I guess..."
"I-Indeed, if you really want me to... N-No, but... Ohhh..."
"Whoa-ho, you two are adorable. That's the Guardian for you, making pushovers out of everyone!"
"This next battle isn't going to be pretty. Everyone's stressed to the brink. Some are entirely against resting."
"But I disagree. There's a time and a place for effort, but there's a time for rest too. I've got to make some noise about letting people rest when they can."

"At the very least, those two seem like they'd be the happier than anyone to go on a trip with you,
<%me>!"
"So take it easy and come along with us. We're looking forward to it. That's a promise between you and me, okay?"
